Class Xref

  • java.lang.Object
    • Xref

  • public class Xref
extends java.lang.Object
    Project Title: Lab 05- Binary Tree and Hashing Project Description: This program will build an index, or a cross-reference listing, for text-based documents. First, it will read in text from a file of words to be omitted from the tree, and create a hash table out of those words. Then it will read in text from another file and store each word (that isn't in the table), the line number, and line position, into a tree. The hashed words will be omitted, and any duplicates will be added to a linked list of line numbers and line positions following the node holding the word. The user will be able to participate in a run-time query that will output the word, count of times it was read, and the line position and number. Version and Date: Version 2.3, November 7, 2017 How to Start the Project: Run Xref Author: Danielle Muhlenberg Palomar ID: 011655732 User Instructions: Run Xref, enter words into query, use font "Consolas" to read text file
